issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for regex extract
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10354](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10354). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The goal of this task is to support the string operation of extracting an item of a regex group, something like sparks' `regexp_extract`.

 

We could do this in the arrow crate and expose it on DataFusion. Note that arrow already depends on an external regex parser for Rust.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10354?focusedCommentId=17313122) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9428
